triples.name: Integer programming
triples.relevance: The paper works with mixed-integer programming problems as the foundation of MIPLIB 2017.

triples.name: Benchmark (computing)
triples.relevance: MIPLIB 2017 includes a specialized benchmark set of 240 instances for evaluating solver performance.

triples.name: Data-driven
triples.relevance: The paper introduces a novel data-driven selection process to compile the library using optimization problems.

triples.name: Optimization problem
triples.relevance: Mixed integer optimization problems are used to encode requirements on diversity and balancedness in the selection process.
